title: Synaptic Shift
description: Synaptic Shift is a neuroscience-driven initiative committed to reshaping how young people engage with brain science, mental health, and policy. Through digital storytelling, interactive content, and accessible resources, we aim to empower underrepresented youth to explore neuroscience, advocate for mental health equity, and become leaders in global health. Our platform bridges research, lived experience, and community action—encouraging the next generation to step into spaces where science meets social impact.
subtitle: Non-Profit

title: Med Teen Talk
description: Med Teen Talk is a teen-led initiative dedicated to educating and empowering youth through accessible content on medicine, mental health, and healthcare careers. We create weekly posts, interviews with professionals, and spotlight opportunities for teens interested in the medical field. Our mission is to make medical knowledge more relatable and build a strong, supportive community of future healthcare leaders.
subtitle: Teen-led Initiative

title: Placeholder Service Offering
subtitle: Service Offering
description: This is a sample service offering to demonstrate how service tiles appear in the Project Hub. You can use this as a template for your own service listings.

title: Research Paper
description: I, along with a few of my fellow high school students, recently completed a research paper on financial literacy. In our paper, we explored how a significant portion of the population lacks basic awareness about managing finances and tends to be lenient or careless with money. The research highlights the urgent need for better financial education, especially among youth and underserved communities. We've finished writing the paper and compiled a well-structured document, including a survey we conducted...
subtitle: Event

title: Health Youth Unity
description: Every child deserves a chance to smile, to play, and to dream –– even in the face of cancer. This non-profit aims to raise funds to support pediatric cancer patients and their families through care packages, hospital visits, emotional support programs, and financial assistance.
subtitle: Non-Profit

title: cherielle
description: cherielle is a 501(c)(3) youth-led nonprofit that strives to 1) bridge the gender gap, 2) empower girls in computer science, and 3) foster a connected, impactful community. Not only do we post about tech, but we offer CS tutoring in several languages & AP CSA prep. We also provide lots of other resources for opportunities and initiatives!
subtitle: Non-Profit

title: STEM by Step
description: A free STEM education platform providing hands-on learning experiences and project-based curriculum for underserved communities.
activityLog: We just released our website! Check it out in our IG bio <3
subtitle: Non-Profit

title: Hearts of Tomorrow
description: Striving to prevent CVD & accommodate those afflicted with practical, affordable technologies and approaches. We offer tools, projects, and programs to aid those in need. Chapter applications on the way & we are currently recruiting team members, DM on IG if interested!
subtitle: Non-Profit
